entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 1:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
